# CapsuleMesh

**Inherits:** [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md) **\<** [Mesh](Mesh.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Class representing a capsule-shaped [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Class representing a capsule-shaped [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md).

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="CapsuleMesh_property_height"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **height** = `2.0` [ðŸ”—](#CapsuleMesh_property_height)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_height**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_height**\ (\ )

Total height of the capsule mesh (including the hemispherical ends).

\ **Note:** The [height](CapsuleMesh.md#CapsuleMesh_property_height) of a capsule must be at least twice its [radius](CapsuleMesh.md#CapsuleMesh_property_radius). Otherwise, the capsule becomes a circle. If the [height](CapsuleMesh.md#CapsuleMesh_property_height) is less than twice the [radius](CapsuleMesh.md#CapsuleMesh_property_radius), the properties adjust to a valid value.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CapsuleMesh_property_radial_segments"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **radial_segments** = `64` [ðŸ”—](#CapsuleMesh_property_radial_segments)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_radial_segments**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_radial_segments**\ (\ )

Number of radial segments on the capsule mesh.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CapsuleMesh_property_radius"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **radius** = `0.5` [ðŸ”—](#CapsuleMesh_property_radius)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_radius**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_radius**\ (\ )

Radius of the capsule mesh.

\ **Note:** The [radius](CapsuleMesh.md#CapsuleMesh_property_radius) of a capsule cannot be greater than half of its [height](CapsuleMesh.md#CapsuleMesh_property_height). Otherwise, the capsule becomes a circle. If the [radius](CapsuleMesh.md#CapsuleMesh_property_radius) is greater than half of the [height](CapsuleMesh.md#CapsuleMesh_property_height), the properties adjust to a valid value.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CapsuleMesh_property_rings"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **rings** = `8` [ðŸ”—](#CapsuleMesh_property_rings)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_rings**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_rings**\ (\ )

Number of rings along the height of the capsule.
